mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( projectName, projectContent, businessSector, insertDt, updateDt, requesterId, requesterName, processState ) VALUES ( #{projectName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessSector, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), #{requesterId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requesterName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processState, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select seq, projectName, projectContent, businessSector, projectOverview, requesterPosition, currentIssue, expectedEffect, finalDeliverables, detailTask, detailContent, detailItDevRequest, processState, requesterId, requesterName, requesterDeptCd, requesterDeptNm, requesterEmail, requesterPhone, insertDt, updateDt, completeDt from board;

select seq, projectName, projectContent, businessSector, projectOverview, requesterPosition, currentIssue, expectedEffect, finalDeliverables, detailTask, detailContent, detailItDevRequest, processState, requesterId, requesterName, requesterDeptCd, requesterDeptNm, requesterEmail, requesterPhone, insertDt, updateDt, completeDt from board where seq = #{seq};
